p: Phosphate buffer, trichloroacetic acid, ferric chloride, hydrochloric acid, ascorbic acid, 2,4,6-tris(2-pyridyl)- s-triazine (TPTZ), Folin–Ciocalteu reagent, gallic acid, 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), potassium hexacyanoferrate(III), 6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetramethylchroman-2-carboxylic acid (Trolox), 2,2′-azino-bis(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid) (ABTS), and dimethylsulfoxide were from Sigma-Aldrich (Santiago, Chile); ferrous sulfate, sodium acetate, sodium carbonate, sodium persulfate, sodium sulfate anhydrous, and ethanol were from Merck (Santiago, Chile).
